videos.title: Big Buck Bunny
videos.description:
Big Buck Bunny tells the story of a giant rabbit with a heart bigger than himself. When one sunny day three rodents rudely harass him, something snaps... and the rabbit ain't no bunny anymore! In the typical cartoon tradition he prepares the nasty rodents a comical revenge.

Licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution license
http://www.bigbuckbunny.org
videos.subtitle: By Blender Foundation

videos.title: Elephant Dream
videos.description: The first Blender Open Movie from 2006

videos.title: For Bigger Blazes
videos.description:
HBO GO now works with Chromecast -- the easiest way to enjoy online video on your TV. For when you want to settle into your Iron Throne to watch the latest episodes. For $35.
Learn how to use Chromecast with HBO GO and more at google.com/chromecast.
videos.subtitle: By Google

videos.title: Night London
videos.description: As the sun sets, London transforms into a mesmerizing blend of glowing streets, historic landmarks, and vibrant nightlife. From the shimmering reflections on the Thames to the bustling energy of Soho, the city's nocturnal charm captivates every wanderer.
videos.subtitle: By Google

videos.title: Majestic River Crossing
videos.description: This stunning aerial view captures a grand bridge stretching across a serene river, seamlessly connecting two landscapes. Surrounded by lush greenery and rugged terrain, the winding roads and modern infrastructure highlight the harmony between human innovation and natureâ€™s beauty. The deep blue waters reflect the sky, adding to the picturesque scene of this remarkable crossing.
videos.subtitle: By Google

videos.title: The Passing Freight
videos.description: A long freight train moves steadily across the railway crossing, carrying colorful cargo containers under the warm glow of the setting sun. The graffiti-covered railcars tell stories of urban expression, while the signal lights stand as silent sentinels of the journey. This image captures the rhythm of industrial movement, where transit and time merge in perfect harmony.
videos.subtitle: By Google

videos.title: Roadside Incident in the Wilderness
videos.description: A winding road cuts through dense green terrain, where an apparent roadside incident has drawn attention. A police vehicle with flashing lights is parked near a small truck, and a few individuals stand nearby. A lone motorcyclist rides past, adding movement to the scene. The surrounding wilderness contrasts with the structured road, highlighting the isolation of the moment.
videos.subtitle: By Google

videos.title: Serenity of Twin Falls
videos.description: Two delicate streams of water cascade gracefully from a rugged cliff, their descent creating a mesmerizing display of nature's tranquility. The lush greenery clings to the rock face, adding vibrant contrast to the earthy tones of the stone. Below, the falls disappear into a deep pool, its surface gently rippling from the endless flow. A hidden paradise, untouched and serene.
videos.subtitle: By Google
